item.title: French Advanced Quiz #3
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: This quiz is based on the French Advanced course by Michel Thomas. 1 “They are waiting for you” Show Answer ils vous attendent function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 What are the three rules for sounding consonants in verbs? Show Answer THEY … - DO always sound the consonant .

item.title: French Advanced Quiz #2
item.author: mail@richardmillen.com (Richard Millen)
item.description: This quiz is based on the French Advanced course by Michel Thomas. 1 Give some examples of re verbs. Show Answer avoir, savoir, voir, pouvoir, devoir. function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.getElementById(divId); if (x.style.display === 'none') { x.style.display = 'block'; } else { x.style.display = 'none'; } } 2 “To put” Show Answer mettre (put money in the meter) function showAnswer(divId) { var x = document.
